notes.text:
Stale bread works best
Don't oversoak or bread will fall apart
Add a pinch of nutmeg for extra flavor

steps.descr: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by whisking together the eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla until it's all beautifully combined.

steps.instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla

steps.descr: Dip bread slices in egg mixture

on_enter.say: Now, let's dip those lovely slices of bread into the egg mixture. Make sure they're nicely coated but not too soggy!

steps.instructions: Dip bread slices in egg mixture

on_enter.say: Let's heat up some butter in a pan over medium heat until it's sizzling and ready for our bread.

steps.descr: Fry bread until golden on both sides

on_enter.say: Time to fry the bread! Cook each slice until it's beautifully golden on both sides. You'll know it's ready when it smells amazing and looks gorgeous.

steps.instructions: Fry bread until golden on both sides

steps.descr: Keep warm in oven while cooking remaining slices

on_enter.say: Let's keep those cooked slices warm in the oven while we finish up the rest. They'll stay nice and toasty!

steps.instructions: Keep warm in oven while cooking remaining slices

on_enter.say: Now, let's stack those golden slices onto plates, ready for the final touches.

steps.descr: Drizzle with maple syrup and top with fresh berries

on_enter.say: Finally, drizzle over some lovely maple syrup and top with fresh berries. Absolutely delicious!

steps.instructions: Drizzle with maple syrup and top with fresh berries

recipe.title: French Toast
recipe.description: Golden eggy bread with cinnamon and maple syrup
